summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4743 for the improvement of Beveridge Place, from California Avenue to the westerly line of Lot 8, Block 1, Replat of Seaview Park, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54895, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
